title: Health Decisions and Consequences
description: Practice discussing health choices and their effects using mixed conditionals.

sentences.text: If I had exercised more in my twenties, I would be fitter now.
sentences.translation: 20대에 운동을 더 했다면, 지금 더 건강했을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /ɪf aɪ hæd ˈeksəsaɪzd mɔːr ɪn maɪ ˈtwentiz, aɪ wʊd biː ˈfɪtər naʊ/
sentences.tips: Stress 'exercised' and 'fitter' - the key contrast words

sentences.text: Had she not smoked for so long, she wouldn't have breathing problems today.
sentences.translation: 그녀가 오랫동안 담배를 피우지 않았다면, 오늘날 호흡 문제가 없었을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /hæd ʃiː nɒt sməʊkt fɔːr səʊ lɒŋ, ʃiː ˈwʊdnt hæv ˈbriːðɪŋ ˈprɒbləmz təˈdeɪ/

sentences.text: If I weren't so stressed, I would have slept better last night.
sentences.translation: 내가 스트레스를 덜 받았다면, 어젯밤에 더 잘 잤을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /ɪf aɪ wɜːnt səʊ strest, aɪ wʊd hæv slept ˈbetər lɑːst naɪt/
sentences.tips: Present condition affecting past - use 'weren't' not 'wasn't'

sentences.text: If governments had invested in prevention, healthcare costs would be lower.
sentences.translation: 정부가 예방에 투자했다면, 의료비가 더 낮았을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /ɪf ˈɡʌvənmənts hæd ɪnˈvestɪd ɪn prɪˈvenʃn, ˈhelθkeər kɒsts wʊd biː ˈləʊər/

sentences.text: I might feel more energetic now if I had changed my diet earlier.
sentences.translation: 일찍 식단을 바꿨다면 지금 더 활력이 넘칠 수도 있다.
sentences.pronunciation: /aɪ maɪt fiːl mɔːr ˌenəˈdʒetɪk naʊ ɪf aɪ hæd tʃeɪndʒd maɪ ˈdaɪət ˈɜːliər/

sentences.text: If she weren't afraid of hospitals, she would have gone for a check-up.
sentences.translation: 그녀가 병원을 두려워하지 않았다면, 검진을 받으러 갔을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /ɪf ʃiː wɜːnt əˈfreɪd əv ˈhɒspɪtlz, ʃiː wʊd hæv ɡɒn fər ə ˈtʃekʌp/

sentences.text: Had we known about the health risks, we would live differently now.
sentences.translation: 건강 위험에 대해 알았다면, 지금 다르게 살았을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /hæd wiː nəʊn əˈbaʊt ðə helθ rɪsks, wiː wʊd lɪv ˈdɪfrəntli naʊ/

sentences.text: If I had prioritized sleep, I wouldn't be suffering from chronic fatigue.
sentences.translation: 수면을 우선시했다면, 만성 피로로 고통받지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /ɪf aɪ hæd praɪˈɒrɪtaɪzd sliːp, aɪ ˈwʊdnt biː ˈsʌfərɪŋ frəm ˈkrɒnɪk fəˈtiːɡ/
sentences.tips: Stress 'prioritized' - a key health vocabulary word

sentences.text: She could have avoided this condition if she were more health-conscious.
sentences.translation: 그녀가 건강에 더 신경 썼다면, 이 상태를 피할 수 있었을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /ʃiː kʊd hæv əˈvɔɪdɪd ðɪs kənˈdɪʃn ɪf ʃiː wɜːr mɔːr ˈhelθ ˈkɒnʃəs/

sentences.text: If the warning signs had been taken seriously, the patient would be healthier.
sentences.translation: 경고 신호를 심각하게 받아들였다면, 환자가 더 건강했을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /ɪf ðə ˈwɔːnɪŋ saɪnz hæd biːn ˈteɪkən ˈsɪəriəsli, ðə ˈpeɪʃnt wʊd biː ˈhelθiər/

sentences.text: Had they followed the doctor's advice, they should be fully recovered by now.
sentences.translation: 의사의 조언을 따랐다면, 지금쯤 완전히 회복되어 있어야 한다.
sentences.pronunciation: /hæd ðeɪ ˈfɒləʊd ðə ˈdɒktərz ədˈvaɪs, ðeɪ ʃʊd biː ˈfʊli rɪˈkʌvəd baɪ naʊ/

sentences.text: If I had been sleeping well, I wouldn't be feeling so exhausted right now.
sentences.translation: 잠을 잘 잤다면, 지금 이렇게 지치지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.pronunciation: /ɪf aɪ hæd biːn ˈsliːpɪŋ wel, aɪ ˈwʊdnt biː ˈfiːlɪŋ səʊ ɪɡˈzɔːstɪd raɪt naʊ/
sentences.tips: Continuous aspect in both clauses - emphasizes ongoing states

dialogue.title: Discussing Lifestyle Changes
dialogue.context: Two friends discuss their health habits and what they wish they had done differently.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: I'm so tired all the time. If I had developed better sleep habits when I was younger, I wouldn't be struggling so much now.
lines.translation: 항상 너무 피곤해. 젊었을 때 더 나은 수면 습관을 들였다면, 지금 이렇게 힘들지 않았을 텐데.

lines.speaker: David
lines.text: I know what you mean. Had I not spent so many years eating junk food, I would be in much better shape.
lines.translation: 무슨 말인지 알아. 정크푸드를 먹으며 그렇게 많은 시간을 보내지 않았다면, 훨씬 건강했을 텐데.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: It's frustrating. If I weren't so busy with work, I would have started exercising regularly months ago.
lines.translation: 답답해. 일이 이렇게 바쁘지 않았다면, 몇 달 전부터 규칙적으로 운동을 시작했을 텐데.

lines.speaker: David
lines.text: That's true. If society took mental health more seriously, we wouldn't be seeing so much burnout.
lines.translation: 맞아. 사회가 정신 건강을 더 진지하게 받아들였다면, 이렇게 많은 번아웃을 보지 않았을 텐데.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: Exactly. Had I known how important preventive care was, I would have made different choices.
lines.translation: 정확히. 예방 관리가 얼마나 중요한지 알았다면, 다른 선택을 했을 텐데.

lines.speaker: David
lines.text: Well, if we start making changes today, we might feel much better a year from now.
lines.translation: 글쎄, 오늘부터 변화를 시작하면, 1년 후에는 훨씬 나아질지도 몰라.

lines.speaker: Emma
lines.text: You're right. If I had maintained a healthy lifestyle from the beginning, I wouldn't be having this conversation.
lines.translation: 네 말이 맞아. 처음부터 건강한 생활 방식을 유지했다면, 이런 대화를 하고 있지 않았을 텐데.

lines.speaker: David
lines.text: True, but it's never too late. If we weren't aware of the problems, we couldn't have made any changes at all.
lines.translation: 맞아, 하지만 아직 늦지 않았어. 문제를 인식하지 못했다면, 어떤 변화도 할 수 없었을 거야.

practiceTopics.topic: Past health decisions affecting current condition
practiceTopics.promptKo: 과거의 건강 결정이 현재 상태에 미친 영향
practiceTopics.example: If I had started running five years ago, I would be much fitter today.

practiceTopics.topic: Current personality affecting past health choices
practiceTopics.promptKo: 현재 성격이 과거 건강 선택에 미친 영향
practiceTopics.example: If I weren't such a workaholic, I would have taken better care of myself.
Had they invested more in public health, the system would be less overwhelmed now.
